item.description:
[b]PuB CrawL MinglE©
Free Food & Drink*!

Only $10 for $20 Worth of Appetizers and Drinks* During the Pub CrawL!

Be a part of a really fun group for up to four hours.

Schedule:
Nov. 6th: We start off at Michael's Harborside in Newburyport for coffee, tea or a cold one at 8pm.

Nov. 13th: We start off at Murphy's Riverside Restaurant in Amesbury for coffee, tea or a cold one at 8pm.

Along the way we’ll play a game of group trivia sponsored by… Brain-Ertainment©!
Winning group members get a cool gift at the end of the evening!

Did you Know: Newburyport is the home of the Coast Guard!
Amesbury was once proclaimed the "Carriage Capital of the World!"
That Newburyport had its own tea party long before the famous one in Boston, and that’s where the idea actually came from!
The nation’s first mechanized nail making factory was in Amesbury!
Well now is the time to explore these lovely cities and the beautiful and historic restaurants and pubs downtown! Come explore some memorable pubs, and restaurants.

Go to Dollarmouse.com to sign up for one (or both) of these pub crawls and enjoy APPETIZERS and FREE* Non-Alchoholic drinks!
item.name: [NEWBURYPORT] PuB CrawL MinglE!
